sec.p:
The wavelet transform can be used to analyze time series that contain nonstationary power at many different frequencies. We use Morlet wavelet to decompose the time series into time-frequency space which enable us to identify the modes of variability and how those modes vary with time
22 . Statistical significance was estimated against a red noise model. For analysis of the covariance of two time series we used cross wavelet which highlights the common highest power in two time series
50 . Statistical significance is estimated against a red noise model. This wavelet analysis was performed using Matlab code available http://grinsted.github.io/wavelet-coherence/.
